scripts.prod: tsc -p tsconfig-amd.json ; tsc -p tsconfig-commonjs.json ; tsc -p tsconfig-es6.json ; tsc -p tsconfig-es2020.json ; tsc -p tsconfig-es2022.json ; tsc -p tsconfig-umd.json
scripts.prepublish-npm: rm -rf dist ; npm run prod ; cp package.json dist/package.json
scripts.publish-npm: cd dist ; npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.com
scripts.release: npm version patch; npm run publish-npm
